org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.render
Class XYPlotRenderer<T extends Tuple2D>

java.lang.Object
  org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.render.XYPlotRenderer<T>

public class XYPlotRenderer<T extends Tuple2D>
extends java.lang.Object

Responsible for iterating over Datasets in a defined drawing order, and then deciding on how to map the visible portions of the domain onto the associated DatasetRenderers.

Author:
Ray Cromwell <ray@timepedia.org>
